title: Venezuela: Citi Promotes Closing Event of Joint Superatec Banking and Finance Education Program
summary: Caracas, Venezuela - On Friday, July 27, 82 participants from the Petare Training Center received their certificates at the closing event of the joint Citibank-SUPERATEC Banking and Finance Education Program, held at Citibank's N.A. Venezuela Branch.
tag-1: Venezuela: Citi Promotes Closing Event of Joint Superatec Banking and Finance Education Program
tag-3: Caracas, Venezuela – On Friday, July 27, 82 participants from the Petare Training Center received their certificates at the closing event of the joint Citibank-SUPERATEC Banking and Finance Education Program, held at Citibank's N.A. Venezuela Branch.
tag-4: The 160-hour finance, technology and human development program helped train participants to improve their job opportunities through a SUPERATEC-managed job bank.
tag-5: Citibank has invested 650,000 bolívares from 2007 to present to support more than 1440 graduates. Of 614 certified graduates as of 2011, 397 (65 percent) have found jobs, 40 in the banking sector. Half of these (189 graduates) have continued their higher education, evidence of the project's efficiency.
tag-6: "We are extremely grateful to Citibank for its trust in SUPERATEC over the last six years, during which time we have developed and offered financial inclusion programs, including banking and finance workshops and today's financial education program, for young men and women from underprivileged communities," said Marilyn de Silva, the NGO's General Manager.
tag-7: During the certificate ceremony, Nelson Acosta, President of Citi Venezuela, spoke about the importance the financial institution places on banking and finance training. "At Citi, we are fully committed to financial inclusion and the economic empowerment of individuals, particularly young trainees, to improve their quality of life and contribute to the progress of their communities," he said.
tag-8: Katherine Rondon, one of the program participants, commented, "I would like to express my appreciation to Citibank and Superatec for their support and dedication to our daily training, for supporting Petare youth, believing in us and offering us this opportunity to grow in the business sector with solid tools. We learned a lot about how a bank works and how to manage our resources."
tag-9: The program has also established new assessment and teaching methods to benefit participants. By customizing workshop content to the needs of the banking labor market, it aims to reduce poverty by strengthening the participants' skills and/or talent.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
